summary: Maybe Sammy is an award-winning cocktail bar inspired by 1950s Vegas glamour. Known for its innovative cocktails and sophisticated ambiance, it offers a unique experience in The Rocks area of Sydney.

details.heading: Maybe Sammy
details.content:
Maybe Sammy brings the spirit of Las Vegas to Sydney with its innovative cocktails and sophisticated ambiance.

  • Award-winning cocktail bar
  • 1950s Vegas-inspired decor
  • Expertly crafted signature drinks

Discover more on their website.
